Joe Biden and Kamala Harris will assume the offices of president and vice president at a time of great societal division as the pandemic continues to ravage the United States.

articles.title: Dentists cleared to administer COVID-19 vaccine in California - KTLA Los Angeles
articles.description: In an effort to speed up vaccinations across the state, Gov. Gavin Newsom announced this week that dentists are now cleared to administer COVID-19.
articles.content:
In an effort to speed up vaccinations across the state, Gov. Gavin Newsom announced this week that dentists are now cleared to administer the COVID-19 vaccine.
